short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button on YouTube videos that shows an alert on click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The YouTube Redirection Extension is a simple browser extension designed to enhance user convenience on YouTube. It adds a custom button to YouTubeâ€™s video tray, allowing users to quickly navigate to a designated game website with a single click.
